task.title: Define Display Fields
task.abstract: Select the data elements to include in the directory output by dragging and dropping the Available Fields into the Selected fields box. Drag and drop the fields in the Selected Fields list until they are in the desired order. As the fields are selected and arranged, they are added to the Profile Fields list. The Profile Fields appear in this order on the Profile modal.

step.cmd: Profile Display Name Fields identify the fields that display on the profile modal header. Check the fields to be displayed. The remaining fields are displayed in the body of the modal window.
Check the Search Fields. These are the fields which the portal user can query to define the directory output.
step.info: Best practices recommend to avoid using email addresses and dates as searchable data elements.

step.cmd: Check the Search Result Fields to identify what data will be displayed in the search result list.When the portal user clicks on a result, it opens the Profile modal with all of the fields that were selected to appear in the directory. The number of records that display on a single search result page is defined by the value saved in the Display Result.
